ygData.subject: Re: Looting LORE items
ygData.msgSnippet: LORE doesn t mean no drop no trade Lore mean u can only have one of such item in your poession you can still drop and trade them as is the case for BBC which
ygData.messageBody:
LORE doesn't mean no drop no trade

Lore mean u can only have one of such item in your poession you can still
drop and trade them as is the case for BBC which is Lore

if a item is no drop no trade most would say so...
exceptions: Paladins testimony of truth, H.K 102 key in soulfire quest

Dest

P.S. I HATE CARRYING THEM WITH ME!!!!!!!! AAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH
----- Original Message -----
From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>; <eqenchanters@onelist.com>;
<eqrangers@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 5:16 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Looting LORE items


> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> With the introduction of LORE items. That is the No drop/No trade items.
>
> If you are in a PvP /Duel situation and you lose can the winner loot LORE
> items from your corpse.
>
> Does anyone know if the following are lore items
>
> Emperor Crush's armor
> Screaming Mace
>
> Does anyone have a definitive answer for what makes an item a lore item.
Is
> it a quest item or merely a special drop item.
>
> Thanks
>
> Chas
